long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension provides the feature to download reviews corresponding to the asin and also has custom filters to modify the dowload range as per the user's requirement . Currently this extension is working for amazon.in only . In near future our team is planning to expand for other amazon marketplaces. Always feel free to provide suggestion or feedback to support@salfire.com.
If you want to access other features provided by Salfire please visit https://salfire.com/ and signup :)
